name: CluClu's Awakening
description:
A minigame that has been created within a week during a game jam battle I have with noxoc. Play against a friend and be either the raging CluClu or the adventurous diver and escape.

Tips:

  • The diver can collect coins and throw them at the Cluclu
  • The CluClu can spit acid at the diver but has to "recharge" it for a few seconds

Note to Mac and Web Version: Thanks to unity there's a version for Mac and a Web Build, however I haven't tested it. It should run, but there's a chance it won't.
